snippet: McGINNIS--Pauline Oldham, born in Philadelphia on July 1, 1929, died in New York City on February 27, 2016. She is survived by her husband of 62 years, John P. McGinnis, sons, John O. and David E., daughters-in-law, Ardith Spence and Ellen Gibson McGinnis, and grandchildren, Anna, Patrick and Miranda. She was the center of her family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: McGINNIS--Pauline Oldham, born in Philadelphia on July 1, 1929, died in New York City on February 27, 2016. She is survived by her husband of 62 years, John P. McGinnis, sons, John O. and David E., daughters-in-law, Ardith Spence and Ellen Gibson McGinnis, and grandchildren, Anna, Patrick and Miranda. She was the center of her family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCGINNIS, PAULINE OLDHAM
